creator: glurrea@yahoo.com
text:
I was installing Apache 2.0.35 and Tomcat 4.0.3, after configure mod_jk the same 
way I did in previous versions, I get an error: Apache can't load module, it's 
like Apache can't find the file mod_jk.dll in modules directory, but I'm sure 
the file is there. ¿mod_jk isn't compatible with Apache 2.0.35?. ¿How I connect 
Apache 2.0.35 and Tomcat 4.0.3?

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Basic Config question; closing report.

This bug database is for tracking bugs in the software, not user setup problems.
Consult the appropriate user support forum.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text: Seems to be a typo. This report is still invalid.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Please do not unconditionally change the report status without an explanation.
Thanks.
